item.title: Time to Blog!
item.author: tim@backgroundprocess.com (Tim Kuhlman)
item.description: Recently in my normal reading I ran across this blog post by Nathan Marz expounding the merits of a blog. Not long after reading this and letting it percolate through my mental background process I begun a class on Coursera, titled Learning How to Learn. In this midst of this class I realized that the benefits of blogging Nathan promotes are essentially ways to enhance your day to day learning.
